properties.entry: SELECT A.POINT AS POINT FROM USER_TABLE A WHERE A.USER_CODE = ?

SELECT B.STORE_NAME AS STORENAME, C.MENU_NAME AS MENUNAME, A.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, C.PRICE AS PRICE FROM BASKET A JOIN STORE_TABLE B ON A.STORE_CODE = B.STORE_CODE JOIN MENU C ON A.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE WHERE A.USER_CODE = ?
